title: Fix release-testing skill consistency issues
body:
## Summary

Fixes consistency issues in the release-testing skill identified during skill-creator review.

## Changes

### Critical
- **Require `-wipe-data` for Android emulators** in setup.md (was missing, contradicted SKILL.md)
- Add boot time note: fresh wipe takes 60-120s vs 15-30s without

### Consistency
- Standardize adb/emulator paths: use PATH (e.g., `emulator`) not full paths (`$ANDROID_HOME/emulator/emulator`)
- Add PATH fallback note in setup.md for when tools aren't in PATH
- Remove redundant "Start Emulators First" section (duplicated Android Emulator Workflow)
- Fix net9.0 → net8.0 to match actual project target framework

## Context

These issues were found during the 3.119.2-preview.3 release testing when tests ran on the wrong emulator. The skill-creator skill was used to review release-testing for consistency and these fixes address the findings.

comments.author: github-actions[bot]
comments.body:
**Triage Summary**  

Labels will be applied to indicate the affected area of documentation and the specific platforms involved (backend/Android and os/Android).

This issue does not classify as a regression as it primarily concerns documentation adjustments rather than functionality changes.

Additional remarks:
* The issue specifically addresses inconsistencies in the documentation for the release-testing skill and related setup instructions, falling under documentation-related concerns.

<details>
<summary>Detailed Summary and Actions</summary>

Summary of the triage:

- The issue involves fixing documentation inconsistencies in the release-testing skill, signifying that it relates to documentation.
- The issue addresses improvements and fixes pertinent to Android emulators, making the backend/Android and os/Android labels applicable.
- No labels related to compatibility, performance, or reliability were deemed appropriate since the issue is focused on documentation rather than functional.

Summary of the actions that will be performed:

| Action       | Item              | Description                                                                                         |
| :----------- | :---------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Apply Label  | area/Docs        | The issue involves fixing documentation inconsistencies in the release-testing skill.              |
| Apply Label  | backend/Android  | The issue specifically addresses improvements and fixes related to Android emulators.              |
| Apply Label  | os/Android       | The issue specifically mentions changes related to the Android operating system and emulators.     |

</details>



_This entire triage process was automated by AI and mistakes may have been made. Please let us know so we can continue to improve._
